sourcesContent:
// src/components/FeaturedJobs.js import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { jobsData } from '../data/jobsData'; const FeaturedJobs = () => { // Filter jobs by different categories const featuredCategories = { development: jobsData.filter(job => job.job_title.toLowerCase().includes('developer') || job.job_title.toLowerCase().includes('engineer') ).slice(0, 3), design: jobsData.filter(job => job.job_title.toLowerCase().includes('design') || job.job_title.toLowerCase().includes('ui') || job.job_title.toLowerCase().includes('ux') ).slice(0, 3), data: jobsData.filter(job => job.job_title.toLowerCase().includes('data') || job.job_title.toLowerCase().includes('machine learning') || job.job_title.toLowerCase().includes('ai') ).slice(0, 3), management: jobsData.filter(job => job.job_title.toLowerCase().includes('manager') || job.job_title.toLowerCase().includes('lead') ).slice(0, 3) }; const formatSalary = (min, max, currency) => { const formatter = new Intl.NumberFormat('en-IN', { style: 'currency', currency: currency || 'INR', maximumFractionDigits: 0 }); return `${formatter.format(min)} - ${formatter.format(max)}`; }; return (

Featured Jobs

{/* Development Jobs */}

Development Jobs View All →

{featuredCategories.development.map(job => (

{job.job_title}

{job.employer_name}

{job.job_city}, {job.job_country}

{formatSalary(job.job_min_salary, job.job_max_salary, job.job_salary_currency)}

View Details
))}
{/* Design Jobs */}

Design Jobs View All →

{featuredCategories.design.map(job => (

{job.job_title}

{job.employer_name}

{job.job_city}, {job.job_country}

{formatSalary(job.job_min_salary, job.job_max_salary, job.job_salary_currency)}

View Details
))}
{/* Data Science Jobs */}

Data Science Jobs View All →

{featuredCategories.data.map(job => (

{job.job_title}

{job.employer_name}

{job.job_city}, {job.job_country}

{formatSalary(job.job_min_salary, job.job_max_salary, job.job_salary_currency)}

View Details
))}
{/* Management Jobs */}

Management Jobs View All →

{featuredCategories.management.map(job => (

{job.job_title}

{job.employer_name}

{job.job_city}, {job.job_country}

{formatSalary(job.job_min_salary, job.job_max_salary, job.job_salary_currency)}

View Details
))}
); }; export default FeaturedJobs;
